@luis: courtesy of iridis_alpha from the torrent comments section on the original, is a solution! it follows:

"they way to stop this crashing during the first movie cutscene is to set SkipIntroVideo =1 in the usersettings.ini - on XP its in C:\Documents and Settings\YOUR USER NAME\My Documents\MyGames\Sid Meier's Civilization 5 "

I got this to work fairly easily. 

1. Open the downloaded .rar file
2. Run The installer.exe
3.Install
4.download the June DirectX SDK release found here: http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/resultsForProduct.aspx?displaylang=en&productID=9C954C37-1ED1-4846-8A7D-85FC422D1388
5.Run on DirectX 10 or 11, no need to mount. 

Thanks for the release.
